item.title: The Lynx and the Hare
item.description: Insert famous quote regarding mathematical modeling Introduction We use a lot of tools to make sense of the world around us. Even without the advent of mathematics, people have been leveraging problem solving techniques, knowingly or unknowingly in one form or another, to provide solutions to problems or rationalizations to phenomena. For instance, our parents may have advised us not to shower in the rain as they have associated this with sickness.
